article_title: Michael Moore Is Right: Obamacare Is Awful, But Single-Payer Would Be Much Worse

article_metadata.description: Supporters of the president have begun beating the drum for single-payer -- with Obamacare serving as a way station on the path there.
article_metadata.author: Sally Pipes
